name: Introduction to Physics
description: A basic course introducing physics fundamentals and concepts.

name: Classical Mechanics
description: A course introducing the principles of classical mechanics.

name: Quantum Mechanics
description: A course introducing the principles of quantum mechanics.

name: Statistical Mechanics
description: A course introducing the principles of statistical mechanics.

name: Thermodynamics
description: A course introducing the principles of thermodynamics.

name: Electromagnetism
description: A course introducing the principles of electromagnetism.

name: Advanced Electromagnetism
description: A more advanced course introducing more advanced principles of electromagnetism.

name: High Energy Physics
description: A course introducing the principles of high energy physics.
